M

main(String[]) - Static method in class GoldMiner
Activates the Gold Miner system
MainScreen - Class in gui
Class implementing the main window of the system, displaying the board explored by the miner alongside important details regarding the agent's behavior (such as the counters of its actions and the contents of its "memory" or records)
MainScreen(int, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, int, int, char) - Constructor for class gui.MainScreen
Creates the main window of the system, displaying the board explored by the miner alongside important details regarding the agent's behavior (such as the counters of its actions and the contents of its "memory" or records)
MainScreenController - Class in controller
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the main screen of the system (that is, the board together with the pertinent statistics)
MainScreenController(MainScreen, GameMaster, InitScreenController) - Constructor for class controller.MainScreenController
 
Miner - Class in gold_miner
Class implementing the rational agent whose actions are deliberated via more sophisticated decision-making processes (explained in the technical report accompanying this program)
Miner(Board) - Constructor for class gold_miner.Miner
Creates a rational agent whose actions are deliberated via more sophisticated decision-making processes (explained in the technical report accompanying this program)
move(Board) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Action corresponding to a move by this rational agent
move(Board) - Method in class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Action corresponding to a move by this nonrational agent
MOVE - Static variable in class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Character code corresponding to a move by this miner
moveMiner(int, int, char) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Updates the display to reflect a move by the miner
movePerBeacon(Board, int, int, int) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Performs a series of actions triggered by landing on a square tile designated as a beacon
moveUntilAllowed(Board) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Action corresponding to the longest series of moves undertaken by this miner without the need for any rotation; returns a character code corresponding to the trigger halting its unidirectional movement
